## FieldNavigationPolicy class

Set of rules controlling keyboard navigation from a field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FieldNavigationPolicy implements INavigationPolicy<Field<any>> 
```
**Implements:** [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy_interface.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Field](./blockly.field_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;any&gt;&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getFirstChild(\_current)](./blockly.fieldnavigationpolicy_class.getfirstchild_1_method.md) |  | Returns null since fields do not have children. |
|  [getNextSibling(current)](./blockly.fieldnavigationpolicy_class.getnextsibling_1_method.md) |  | Returns the next field or input following the given field. |
|  [getParent(current)](./blockly.fieldnavigationpolicy_class.getparent_1_method.md) |  | Returns the parent block of the given field. |
|  [getPreviousSibling(current)](./blockly.fieldnavigationpolicy_class.getprevioussibling_1_method.md) |  | Returns the field or input preceding the given field. |
|  [isApplicable(current)](./blockly.fieldnavigationpolicy_class.isapplicable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy. |
|  [isNavigable(current)](./blockly.fieldnavigationpolicy_class.isnavigable_1_method.md) |  | Returns whether or not the given field can be navigated to. |
